amendment.description: Amendment authorizes $5 million for the State Department to work to improve intellectual property law and enforcement in developing countries.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 29 printed in part B of House Report 109-175 to authorize $5 million for the State Department to improve intellectual property law and enforcement in developing countries.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Watson amendment (A028) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A028) offered by Ms. Watson.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Watson amendment (A028) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
